query:
SELECT c.id, c.title, c.`order`, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weeks w WHERE w.cycleId = c.id AND w.type = 'live') as live_count
FROM cycles c
ORDER BY c.`order`;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user i85uFKDwpvRSYau.be51874fae2b --database SDSD6dYMrjnK6khV9TAsBM --execute 
SELECT c.id, c.title, c.`order`, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weeks w WHERE w.cycleId = c.id AND w.type = 'live') as live_count
FROM cycles c
ORDER BY c.`order`;
